revised_title: Robert Kenneth Callow: A Pioneering Biochemist and Educator
tldr: This biographical memoir recounts the life and career of Robert Kenneth Callow, a prominent biochemist and educator. Born in 1901, Callow's early life and family background are detailed, as well as his education at the City of London School and later at the University of Oxford. Callow's experiences and influences, including his passion for science and his interest in human medicine, are discussed. The memoir highlights his contributions to the field of biochemistry and his dedication to education, as well as his personal beliefs and values.
